data_description.temperature_sensor_entity_id: Entity ID of the temperature sensor
data_description.precision: Precision of the temperature sensor. Usually this is 0.1 or 1. Some sensors might have a higher accuracity and use 0.01
data_description.valve_entity_id: Entity ID of the valve position input
data_description.valve_max_position: Maximum position of the valve. Usually the valve range is 0-100. Some thermostats like Eurotronic use 0-255
data_description.min_cycle_duration: Minimum cycle duration in seconds. Useful to prevent the valve from moving too often, reducing battery life.

valve_position.title: Valve Position Mapping
valve_position.description: Define custom position mappings for the valve. Enter as JSON key-value pairs where keys are temperatures and values are valve positions.

data_description.position_mapping: It's recommended to leave this as default for now. You can fine tune it later on.

data_description.min_temp: Minimum temperature that can be set
data_description.max_temp: Maximum temperature that can be set
data_description.target_temp_step: Increment by which the temperature can be adjusted
